- Hey, yesterday I ran into Andrei.
- Да ты что! Колосова? Из пятой группы?: - You are kidding! Andrei Kolosov? From the 5th group?
- No way! It seems like it's been a hundred years since I've seen him.
- Well that's exactly how he looks.
- Да ладно, брось ты. Это наш-то суперме: - Whatever, give it up. Our superman?
- Представь себе. Он очень сдал. Ты ведь: - You can't imagine how he has aged. you know that he's now a TV journalist?
- Понятия не имею! Он что, переквалифици: - No, I had no idea! Is he qualified for journalism?
- Ну, у гуманитариев сфера применения до: - Well, it seems that they take a wide-variety of people.
- Это да. А я-то голову ломала, где я ви: - That's for sure. I was racking my brains trying to figure out where I'd seen that journalist before? And it's Andrei. I never would have guessed. He has really changed: he's gone bald, gained weight and has circles under his eyes. And he dresses terribly as well. What happened to him?
- Да я с ним говорила всего ничего, но о: - I only talked to him for a second, but from the girls I heard that he and Lena got divorced. Do you remember Lena?
- А как же, красивая была девица, но не: - Of course, she was a pretty girl but not that smart.
- Ну так вот, потом он снова женился на: - Yeah, well he then got remarried to a woman with two children and it seems that they also have a child together.
- А от первого брака у него есть дети?: - And from the first marriage does he have any children?
- Вот этого я не знаю. Хотя, судя по его: -That I don't know. Although, judging by the way he looks I would say he has at least 10 kids.
- Ну ты и язва, как говорят в народе!: - Why you are such a gossip!
- I consider that to  be a complement for a woman. So thank you.
